page.title: 10CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: AT SCHOOL WE PLAY GAMES LIKE BUDGE AND TIGGY ON THE WHITE LINES. BUDGE IS A GAME WHERE THERE IS ONE PERSON ON AND THE GREEN POLES ARE HOME (PART OF THE SCHOOL BUILDING). THE PERSON WHO IS ON HAS TO TIG SOMEONE WHILE THEY ARE NOT ON A GREEN POLE. IF THE PERSON WHO IS ON TIGS YOU WHILE YOU ARE NOT ON A GREEN POLE YOU SWAP PLACES AND YOU ARE ON. TIGGY ON THE WHITE LINES IS A GAME WHERE THERE IS A COURT AND AGAIN THERE IS SOMEONE ON. WE ALSO PLAY A SKIPPING GAME CALLED LOOPS THAT IS WHERE A PERSON JUMPS IN AND FIRST OF ALL DOES NO SKIPS. THEN THEY JUMP IN AGAIN AND DO ONE SKIP THEN 2,3,4 AND SO ON, UNTIL YOU CATCH THE ROPE WITH YOUR FOOT AND STOP IT. THEN YOU ARE OUT.
